EmailTemplate.name: 04_30_2014 MSFT TechEd.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to TechEd North America {{lead.first name:default=May 12-15}}? | Respond for a VMT-Shirt!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo will be at Booth #1347. And we want to see you {{lead.first name:default=}}. TechEd North America 2014 is SOLD OUT, but if you'll be there, we want to see you and talk about all of the exciting ways that VMTurbo is innovating to drive control of Microsoft Hyper-V <http://bit.ly/1iMAnwA>.
If you'll be there, be among the first 10 IT Pros to email VMTurbo's very own Ally House <mailto: ally.house@vmturbo.com>, and when we pack our bags, we will provision a highly-prized VMT-Shirt just for you:
Yes, these VMTees are 100% awesome, and yes, Ally is a real person. Email Ally <mailto: ally.house@vmturbo.com> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
